components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delay to Airtel Network in Congo

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Airtel Network in Congo. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: Issues With Verify (2FA) Traffic to China

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience issues with Verify (2FA) traffic to China. Our engineers continue to work to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Republic of Serbia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MTS

incident_updates.body: The MTS network in the Republic of Serbia is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 November 2024 at 16:00 PST until 16 November 2024 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MTS Republic of Serbia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance - Emergency Services

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in the United States and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 Nov 2024 at 01:00 PST until 21 Nov 2024 at 02:00 PST for Emergency Services.

During the maintenance window, some emergency calls may be routed to the Emergency Call Relay Center (ECRC) instead of directly to the Public Safety Answering Point (PSAP). All emergency calls will still connect successfully.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 06 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 27 November 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

06 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 06 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
11 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 11 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
13 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 13 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
18 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 18 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
20 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 20 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
25 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 25 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
27 November 2024 at 12:00 PST until 27 November 2024 at 16:00 PST
